Monochromatic is an app to facilitate phone usage at night, by enabling the built in monochrome feature in Android 5 or later
As this changes a system setting uninstalling this app wont revert it, to do that either disable the app before uninstalling or change back to color mode in the developer settings
Unlike other night screen apps, this doesn\'t create an overlay, enabling monochrome for all screens and views, and does not interfere with android secure actions such as installing apps
Starting from android 8 apps are required to show a notification to be able to run in the background, the notification can be hidden by holding down on it and toggling the switch that appears
